name: Frame n Flow Media
description: AI-Integrated Marketing Agency specializing in Business Intelligence, Generative AI Visuals, and Growth Automation.

growth_partner_program.name: Growth Partner Program
growth_partner_program.description: Performance-based partnership where individuals connect qualified leads with Frame n Flow Media and earn 20-30% commission
growth_partner_program.how_it_works: Partners conduct cold outreach, schedule calls, participate in sales presentations. Frame n Flow handles all service delivery.
growth_partner_program.commission: 20-30% of total deal value, varies by deal size and complexity
requirements: Ability to identify and qualify business leads
No prior experience required - training provided

guarantee: 100% Refund if qualified lead targets are not met.
